document.full_text: historic flooding in the missouri river basin spurred voluntary evacuations in north dakota on monday, while in montana emergency workers ferried food and water to a town cut off by flood waters.
document.title: snowmelt, rain worsen flooding in northern plains
lines_and_colors: historic flooding in the missouri river basin spurred voluntary evacuations in north dakota on monday, while in montana emergency workers ferried food and water to a town cut off by flood waters.
